object_name.value: Validate user is a member of cd_can_bulk_prop_update group

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
You need to be a member of the Bulk Properties Update group (cd_can_bulk_prop_update) in order to use this function.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select group_name from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_can_bulk_prop_update' and any i_all_users_names = '$USER')
